wikitext.*:
'''Parma Nölé''' is the journal of the [[North East Tolkien Society]]. The publication is released in four to six issues per year. The journal is included with a membership to the Society, which costs $30.00 USD a year.

==Etymology==
The name seems to be composed of the [[Quenya]] words ''[[parma]]'' ("book, writing, composition, written document of some size") and ''[https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-615208449.html nólë]'' ("lore, knowledge, long study"), although the latter with its diacritics reversed.
